DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical trial compare growth infant ( express weight gain g/day ) consume new extensively hydrolyze formula ( EHF ) infant consume commercially available EHF .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Infants Fed Extensively Hydrolyzed Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn singleton infant Fullterm ( > = 37 week gestation ) Birth weight > = 2500 < =4500 g 14 Â± 3 day age enrollment Infant 's mother elect breastfeed baby exclusively formula feed minimum 3 day prior enrollment Study explain write information provide Parent/Caregiver Informed consent sign ( parent/legal representative ) Congenital illness malformation affect infant feed and/or growth Suspected know allergy cow 's milk protein Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Any readmission hospital ( except hyperbilirubinemia ) prior enrollment Infant receive oral IV antibiotic therapy 10 day prior enrollment Infant receive prescription medication ( exception topical antibiotic and/or treatment thrush ) frequent use counter medication except vitamin mineral supplement Infant receive probiotic seven day prior enrollment Infant currently participate another clinical study Infant 's family Investigator 's assessment expect comply protocol
